headline: NRG Energy Doubles Fleet As Governance Shifts And Valuation Gap Persists
summary: NRG Energy closed its acquisition of a large power generation portfolio from LS Power, effectively doubling its generation fleet. The transaction received required antitrust and regulatory approvals, clearing the way for integration of the new assets. Sanjay Kapoor joined the NRG Energy board, adding additional financial and operational experience to governance. NRG Energy (NYSE:NRG) is coming off a 1 year share price move of 50.7%, with the stock last closing at $153.32. Returns over 3...
